trends: There have been 5 other sightings in deltona
There were no other sightings in deltona on or around July 30th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was drving home from a gig @ the comfort zone on wednesday,july 30,2008.I was on I-4 heading westbound toward winter park,when I noticed a bright light in the sky that seemed to following me.As I drove for a few miles,my radio stopped playing and the car died down.I managed to pull over to the side and I remember thinking "I'll just wait for the road rangers."Within a minute,a knock came on my drivers' side window.I rolled down the window & said "WOW,that was quick! a male voice answered me & said "ok David, we'll take over form here."The next memory I have is waking up OR "coming to" in my bedrooms.I couldn't move my body,but I could move my eyes.Right about then I smelled something burning.I said "what's that burning smell?"A male voice answered me & said "Don't worry,just be quiet."As he he said that,I could feel something being done to my lower right leg.When I woke up,I Immediately threw my blanket off to look @ my leg & noticed a square shape had been "shaved" off of my calf area roughly about "5x7". Was (the area) also shinny.
